content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a browse_website command from you and opened the website https://www.nhm.ac.uk/discover/octopuses-keep-surprising-us-here-are-eight-examples-how.html. The website lists unique characteristics of octopuses, including their ability to change color and texture, regrow limbs, and escape from containers.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Octopuses have a range of unique characteristics, including having more than one brain, being seriously clever, using tools, recognising people, having unusual reproductive methods, being self-sacrificing mothers, and having cunning disguises and escape techniques. They are also able to change color and texture to blend in with their surroundings, use ink as a defense mechanism, regenerate limbs, have three hearts, and some have been discovered to build underwater cities. Octopus blood is blue due to the presence of copper-based protein. \n \n Links: ['cookies (https://www.nhm.ac.uk/about-us/cookies-on-the-museums-website.html)', 'Manage my preferences (https://www.nhm.ac.uk/about-us/cookie-preferences.html)', 'Skip to content (https://www.nhm.ac.uk/discover/octopuses-keep-surprising-us-here-are-eight-examples-how.html#main-content)', ' (https://www.nhm.ac.uk/)', '\\n\\t\\t\\t\\t\\t\\tVisit\\n\\t\\t\\t\\t\\t (https://www.nhm.ac.uk/visit.html)']"}]
"""
